result.title: Benefits of training camps
result.content:
I was always thinking why do many teams prefer and gain from training camps ? ( petro,barcelona,summer/winter camps) mainly ones hosted by experienced coaches.

say for a blue coder, how can training camps help him increase his lvl since they last for 6-10 days ? is that period enough for a peak ? what are they like ? i am thinking of attending a camp so thats why am asking..beside the fun of course.

thank u
